caption.center: Brenda Bennett, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Harry McDonald
Williams, Jr., Appellant, v. Wilbro, Inc., Respondent.

court.center: Court of Appeals of South Carolina.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER
After reviewing the Petition for Rehearing in this case, it is ordered that the opinion heretofore filed be withdrawn and the attached opinion be substituted. The Petition for Rehearing is denied.
AND IT IS SO ORDERED.
[EDITORS' NOTE: JUSTICES SIGNATURES IS ELECTRONICALLY NON-TRANSFERRABLE.]
